Through original programming, documentaries, and expert-led discussions, MHTN aims to increase awareness, provide valuable information, and encourage open conversations about mental well-being.

programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.title: Emergence Days

programme.title: Relentless
programme.desc: Framed for a murder he didn't commit, a cowboy hides with a traveling woman as he flees a sheriff and hunts for the real killer.

programme.title: Hour of the Gun
programme.desc: While the Earp brothers may have won the gunfight at the O.K. Corral, they didn't escape unscathed for long. Seeking revenge over their fallen comrades, members of the Clanton gang go after the Earp family, gunning down both Virgil and Morgan Earp. But they don't succeed at getting Wyatt (James Garner). Now it's his turn to seek revenge. With Doc Holliday (Jason Robards) by his side, Wyatt forms a posse, and they won't rest until every member of the Clanton gang is dead.

programme.title: The Harder They Fall
programme.desc: Broke and without work, newspaper reporter Eddie Willis (Humphrey Bogart) agrees to work for the corrupt boxing promoter Nick Benko (Rod Steiger) to help hype his new boxer, Toro Moreno (Mike Lane). While Toro is beastly in appearance, he has no actual boxing talent, and all his fights are fixed. When Toro gets a shot at the title against the brutal Buddy Brannen (Max Baer), Willis is faced with the tough decision of whether or not to tell Toro that his entire career is a sham.

programme.title: Miss Grant Takes Richmond
programme.desc: Ellen Grant (Lucille Ball) is the worst student at her secretarial school, yet surprisingly, she is hired by real estate agent Dick Richmond (William Holden). It turns out that Dick's real estate office is just a front for a betting operation. When Ellen unknowingly takes a large bet from Dick's old flame, Peggy (Janis Carter), Peggy demands that Dick must either pay up or run off with her. It's up to the dizzy Miss Grant to find a way to extract Dick from this mess.

programme.title: Made for Each Other
programme.desc: While on a business trip, an ambitious, young lawyer immediately falls in love with a stranger. They wed the following day, and tragedy soon strikes.

programme.title: Hook, Line and Sinker
programme.desc: Two insurance agents (Bert Wheeler, Robert Woolsey) turn an old hotel into a social hub ripe for crooks.

programme.title: Entertaining the Troops
programme.desc: A tribute to performers who assisted the military at home and abroad includes footage of Bob Hope, Bing Crosby, Jack Benny, the Andrews Sisters, Dinah Shore, Abbott & Costello and Bugs Bunny.

programme.title: Rimfire
programme.desc: An undercover Army captain (James Millican) links missing gold and murder to a gambler's (Reed Hadley) ghost.

programme.title: Through the Bible With Les Feldick
programme.desc: Les Feldick was an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible. His simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.title: The Casebook of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Holmes is consulted by a man who is concerned about the sudden strange behavior of his employer, who has taken to visiting a ruined crypt at nighttime, and bones are later discovered in his furnace.

programme.title: Rimfire
programme.desc: An undercover Army captain (James Millican) links missing gold and murder to a gambler's (Reed Hadley) ghost.

programme.title: A Tornado in the Saddle
programme.desc: Ranchers and a new sheriff (Russell Hayden) have trouble with a gold rush.

programme.title: Hour of the Gun
programme.desc: While the Earp brothers may have won the gunfight at the O.K. Corral, they didn't escape unscathed for long. Seeking revenge over their fallen comrades, members of the Clanton gang go after the Earp family, gunning down both Virgil and Morgan Earp. But they don't succeed at getting Wyatt (James Garner). Now it's his turn to seek revenge. With Doc Holliday (Jason Robards) by his side, Wyatt forms a posse, and they won't rest until every member of the Clanton gang is dead.

programme.title: Gunman's Walk
programme.desc: Rancher Lee Hackett (Van Heflin) spends so much time trying to keep the violent streak of his son Ed (Tab Hunter) in check, he neglects the needs of his other son Davy (James Darren). When Ed's temper results in the death of an innocent Native American, Lee tries his best to cover his son's tracks by making a deal with unscrupulous horse trader Jensen (Ray Teal), who falsely testifies on Ed's behalf. But it becomes clear that Ed can't change, and a shootout between father and son ensues.

programme.title: The Fuller Brush Girl
programme.desc: Milquetoast Humphrey Briggs (Eddie Albert) and his impetuous girlfriend, Sally Elliot (Lucille Ball), are office workers at a shipping firm whose corrupt owner, Harvey Simpson (Jerome Cowan), uses his company as a front for a massive smuggling operation. When an accident causes Simpson's rich and jealous wife (Lee Patrick) to assume he's cheating on her, the lovebirds get unwillingly drawn into a murder investigation involving a stripper (Gale Robbins) and a hired killer (Fred Graham).

programme.title: The Goddess
programme.desc: As a child, she was Emily Ann, a poor girl in the South with no friends and an ineffective mother. But as an adult, she's Rita Shawn (Kim Stanley), an actress loved the world over. Still, all the money and fame in the world can't buy happiness, and Rita is plagued with depression over her broken relationships -- first to a handsome soldier (Steve Hill) and then to a boxing promoter (Lloyd Bridges) -- and her lack of any emotional connections to anyone outside of her professional life.

programme.title: The Passionate Friends
programme.desc: In this drama, based on the H.G. Wells novel, Mary (Ann Todd) longs for Steven (Trevor Howard), a lover she turned down years ago. Later, Mary is married to Howard (Claude Rains), but meets up with Steven while on vacation in the Swiss Alps. A seemingly platonic encounter fueled by pent-up passion leads to an affair between Mary and Steven, and she must choose between the two men -- the husband who loves her and the now-married man she rejected years earlier.

programme.title: Stolen Face
programme.desc: A plastic surgeon (Paul Henreid) makes a convict look like the pianist (Lizabeth Scott) he loves, then marries her.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid in Old New Mexico
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid (Duncan Renaldo) and Pancho (Martin Garralaga) free a girl (Gwen Kenyon) accused of murder, then find the killer.

programme.title: King of the Bandits
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid and Pancho track an outlaw responsible for a series of stagecoach robberies and masquerading as the Kid.

programme.title: Through the Bible With Les Feldick
programme.desc: Les Feldick was an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible. His simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.title: Paid Programming: Carshield -- Cars Have Changed
The Casebook of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The detective tries to clear a man accused of patricide.

programme.title: The Fuller Brush Girl
programme.desc: Milquetoast Humphrey Briggs (Eddie Albert) and his impetuous girlfriend, Sally Elliot (Lucille Ball), are office workers at a shipping firm whose corrupt owner, Harvey Simpson (Jerome Cowan), uses his company as a front for a massive smuggling operation. When an accident causes Simpson's rich and jealous wife (Lee Patrick) to assume he's cheating on her, the lovebirds get unwillingly drawn into a murder investigation involving a stripper (Gale Robbins) and a hired killer (Fred Graham).

programme.title: The Goddess
programme.desc: As a child, she was Emily Ann, a poor girl in the South with no friends and an ineffective mother. But as an adult, she's Rita Shawn (Kim Stanley), an actress loved the world over. Still, all the money and fame in the world can't buy happiness, and Rita is plagued with depression over her broken relationships -- first to a handsome soldier (Steve Hill) and then to a boxing promoter (Lloyd Bridges) -- and her lack of any emotional connections to anyone outside of her professional life.

programme.title: The Ranger and the Lady
programme.desc: A Texas Ranger (Roy Rogers) and his partner (George "Gabby" Hayes) try to tax a woman's (Jacqueline Wells) wagon train on the Santa Fe Trail.

programme.title: Gunman's Walk
programme.desc: Rancher Lee Hackett (Van Heflin) spends so much time trying to keep the violent streak of his son Ed (Tab Hunter) in check, he neglects the needs of his other son Davy (James Darren). When Ed's temper results in the death of an innocent Native American, Lee tries his best to cover his son's tracks by making a deal with unscrupulous horse trader Jensen (Ray Teal), who falsely testifies on Ed's behalf. But it becomes clear that Ed can't change, and a shootout between father and son ensues.

programme.title: Bad Bascomb
programme.desc: Outlaw Zeb Bascomb (Wallace Beery) flees from federal agents with his partner, Bart Yancy (J. Carrol Naish). After Bart kills a Mormon missionary, the men join the Mormon caravan, pretending to be converts. Dismayed at being put to hard work, they nevertheless maintain their cover, and Zeb befriends 9-year-old Emmy (Margaret O'Brien). When Zeb and Yancy discover the caravan is carrying a substantial amount of gold, Zeb's unexpected fatherly sentiment for Emmy hinders their robbery plans.

programme.title: The Long, Long Trailer
programme.desc: Nicholas Collini (Desi Arnaz) has to travel for his job as an engineer -- so his fiancée, Tacy (Lucille Ball), suggests that rather than buy a house after their wedding, they invest in a motor home so they can see the country together. But the aggravations of life with nosy trailer park neighbors and the dangers of piloting an enormous trailer across narrow country roads soon take their toll on the happy couple, putting their young marriage in turmoil.

programme.title: The Facts of Life
programme.desc: The Gilberts, Larry (Bob Hope) and Mary (Ruth Hussey), and the Weavers, Jack (Don DeFore) and Kitty (Lucille Ball), are neighbors and close friends -- even though Larry and Kitty always grate on each other's nerves. When the friends' annual vacation arrives, Larry and Kitty are the only ones at the hotel, as their spouses can't make it. Stuck together for the trip, Larry and Kitty, surprisingly, fall in love. The two must now contemplate whether starting over is worth it at middle age.

programme.title: So Ends Our Night
programme.desc: In Austria, German Ludwig Kern (Glenn Ford) is stripped of his passport and jailed for 40 days when he admits he is a Jew. Befriended by German political dissident Josef Steiner (Fredric March), the men travel to Czechoslovakia together upon their release. As the German army closes in on first Czechoslovakia, then Austria and ultimately France as war begins, Ludwig, Josef and fellow refugee Ruth Holland (Margaret Sullavan), without passports, desperately try to keep one step ahead of them.

programme.title: The Big Lift
programme.desc: During the 1948 Berlin Airlift, as British and American forces break a Russian blockade of the divided German city, a pair of American soldiers fall in love with local women against a backdrop of increasing Cold War tensions. Ground control specialist Hank Kowalski (Paul Douglas) finds happiness with the idealistic Gerda (Bruni Löbel), but, when pilot Danny MacCullough (Montgomery Clift) falls for the beautiful, mysterious Frederica (Cornell Borchers), his friends question her motives.

programme.title: Sunnyside
programme.desc: A hotel maintenance man has the uncanny ability to create chaos wherever he ventures.

programme.title: The Big Trees
programme.desc: Corrupt Wisconsin lumberman Jim Fallon (Kirk Douglas) travels to Northern California at the dawn of the 20th century in order to gain control of a tract of redwood forest. Fallon's underhanded tactics stir resentment from everyone, including settler Elder Bixby (Charles Meredith) ; his beautiful daughter, Alicia (Eve Miller) ; Fallon's fair-minded employee, Yukon Burns (Edgar Buchanan) ; and his right-hand man, Frenchy LeCroix (John Archer) -- and his cheating ways create unlikely bedfellows.

programme.title: The Long, Long Trailer
programme.desc: Nicholas Collini (Desi Arnaz) has to travel for his job as an engineer -- so his fiancée, Tacy (Lucille Ball), suggests that rather than buy a house after their wedding, they invest in a motor home so they can see the country together. But the aggravations of life with nosy trailer park neighbors and the dangers of piloting an enormous trailer across narrow country roads soon take their toll on the happy couple, putting their young marriage in turmoil.

programme.title: The Gay Cavalier
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid (Gilbert Roland) and Pancho (Martin Garralaga) try to help an unhappy bride.

programme.title: Cattle Queen of Montana
programme.desc: When defiant female rancher Sierra Nevada Jones (Barbara Stanwyck) sweeps into Montana, she receives a hostile welcome from a tribe of Native Americans who attack her cattle and leave her father dead. Kindly Indian brave Colorados (Lance Fuller) and government officer Farrell (Ronald Reagan) help Sierra fight for her land against treacherous locals like the envious Tom McCord (Gene Evans), a neighboring rancher determined to cheat Jones out of her property and drive her back to Texas.

programme.title: Bad Bascomb
programme.desc: Outlaw Zeb Bascomb (Wallace Beery) flees from federal agents with his partner, Bart Yancy (J. Carrol Naish). After Bart kills a Mormon missionary, the men join the Mormon caravan, pretending to be converts. Dismayed at being put to hard work, they nevertheless maintain their cover, and Zeb befriends 9-year-old Emmy (Margaret O'Brien). When Zeb and Yancy discover the caravan is carrying a substantial amount of gold, Zeb's unexpected fatherly sentiment for Emmy hinders their robbery plans.

programme.title: Gunfight at Comanche Creek
programme.desc: In 1875, a band of brutal bandits craft a dastardly scheme. First they bust a convicted man out of jail, and then they force him to commit a string of robberies to increase the price on his head. Finally, they murder him and collect the bounty. Lawman Bob Gifford (Audie Murphy) is onto their vicious plan, and he goes undercover as a prisoner to lure in these savage villains. But he struggles to stay focused after crossing paths with a sweet saloon owner (Colleen Miller).

programme.title: Fire Over Africa
programme.desc: An undercover woman (Maureen O'Hara) fights Tangier smugglers with an undercover man (Macdonald Carey) who does not know who she is.

programme.title: 711 Ocean Drive
programme.desc: Mal Granger (Edmond O'Brien) is a telephone repairman with a passion for horse betting. He puts his electronics expertise to work assisting gangster Vince Walters (Barry Kelly) in expanding his illegal racing wire, and, when Walters is murdered, Granger takes over the operation. However, Granger's growing success is soon threatened by both Larry Mason (Donald Porter), an East Coast mobster who wants in on the action, and Lieutenant Pete Wright (Howard St. John), who's after Granger for murder.

programme.title: Shadow Man
programme.desc: A British casino owner gets involved with the wife of a gambler and finds himself the focal point of a murder case.

programme.title: You Only Live Once
programme.desc: Joan Graham (Sylvia Sidney) works as the secretary to the public defender. Unfortunately, she's fallen madly in love with a criminal by the name of Eddie Taylor (Henry Fonda). Convinced that Eddie is a good man with bad luck, she pulls some strings and gets Eddie released from prison early. The two get married, but while Eddie tries to fly right, he soon discovers he can't change his nature. His past comes knocking at their door, and the couple is forced to go into hiding.

programme.title: Apache Rifles
programme.desc: A U.S. Cavalry officer (Audie Murphy) falls in love with a part-Indian missionary (Linda Lawson) in Arizona.

programme.title: The Lone Prairie
programme.desc: A cowboy (Russell Hayden) protects hardworking settlers from outlaws that are trying to exploit them.

programme.title: Paid Programming
programme.desc: Paid programming.

programme.title: Word of God Ministries
programme.desc: Pastor James McMenis and his wife Chrissy are dedicated to winning the lost to Jesus and making disciples of the saved. Their goal is to bring clarity to the Word of God, making it life-applicable to people everywhere.

programme.title: The Catholic Mass
programme.desc: The Heart of the nation Sunday mass brings the beauty and traditions of the Catholic faith.

programme.title: Perry Stone
programme.desc: Religious teachings from Perry Stone.

programme.title: Silver Lode
programme.desc: A Nevada rancher (John Payne) is taken from his bride (Lizabeth Scott) by a killer (Dan Duryea) posing as a U.S. marshal on the Fourth of July.

programme.title: The Lone Prairie
programme.desc: A cowboy (Russell Hayden) protects hardworking settlers from outlaws that are trying to exploit them.

programme.title: Gunfight at Comanche Creek
programme.desc: In 1875, a band of brutal bandits craft a dastardly scheme. Lawman Bob Gifford (Audie Murphy) is onto their vicious plan, and he goes undercover as a prisoner to lure in these savage villains. But he struggles to stay focused after crossing paths with a sweet saloon owner (Colleen Miller).

programme.title: Raton Pass
programme.desc: Homesteaders help a husband (Dennis Morgan) fight his wife (Patricia Neal) and her gunman (Steve Cochran) for their New Mexico ranch.

programme.title: Yours, Mine and Ours
programme.desc: Navy officer Frank Beardsley (Henry Fonda) is struggling to raise his 10 children in the wake of his wife's death. Frank soon begins dating Helen North (Lucille Ball), a widowed nurse with eight children of her own. After learning of their similar situations, the two are reluctant to pursue a relationship. But with the help of a mutual friend, Darrel Harrison (Van Johnson), the two eventually fall in love and must decide about forming one big, unconventional family.

programme.title: Spencer's Mountain
programme.desc: Clay Spencer (Henry Fonda) and his wife, Olivia (Maureen O'Hara), live in a small town deep in the mountains. When Clay isn't busy drinking with his buddies or railing against the town minister (Wally Cox), he's building the house he's always promised Olivia. He is overjoyed when he learns his eldest son (James MacArthur) will be the first Spencer to attend college, if he can resist the charms of a pretty local girl (Mimsy Farmer) and rustle up the money for tuition.

programme.title: Rocky Mountain
programme.desc: A Rebel officer (Errol Flynn) and his men use a Yankee bride (Patrice Wymore) to lure Union troops in Indian country.

programme.title: The Scarlet and the Black
programme.desc: Defying a Nazi colonel (Christopher Plummer), Vatican Monsignor Hugh O'Flaherty (Gregory Peck) hides thousands of escaped POWs in occupied Rome.

programme.title: Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: After graduating from West Point, Jeb Stuart and George Custer are both stationed at Fort Leavenworth in Kansas. Once there, they find that the violent abolitionist John Brown has laid waste to the state, killing anyone who gets in the way of his anti-slavery crusade. While the duo must work together to battle the murderous revolutionary, they also come to blows over their competing love for Kit Carson Holliday.

programme.title: Through the Bible With Les Feldick
programme.desc: Les Feldick was an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible. His simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp resists forming a posse and instead uses American Indian scouts in his efforts to locate a killer.

programme.title: The Casebook of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: In the most dangerous assignment of his career, Holmes is asked to stop the marriage of Violet Merville to Baron Gruner.

programme.title: Art of wild
programme.desc: Art of wild is a film series that aims to tell stories about the wild in the most cinematic way possible. To tell the best stories we travel to the most incredible places. It is in the wild places where most won't go that the human spirit is fed. Only a hunter knows what it's like to wake up with the woods, or hear a bull bugle in the graylight, these moments are what make up the beauty of the wild.

programme.title: Adrenaline
programme.desc: Experience the heart-pounding action of fair-chase whitetail hunting with host Kyle Wieter and the entire Adrenaline crew as they pursue giant Midwestern bucks. This dedicated team embraces the challenges of the hunt, navigating intense highs, unexpected lows, and the unpredictable nature of these ultimate survival machines.

programme.title: The Most Wanted List
programme.desc: Three spitfire cowgirls are headed on a cross country road trip of epic proportions to make their dream adventures come true.

programme.title: Winchester Deadly Passion
programme.desc: We all have those bucket list hunts, but here we cover Melissa's top four adventures.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steve returns to his favorite Sonoran hunting grounds to hunt for a big coeus deer during peak rut. Joined by master hunter Remi Warren and his compound bow, the men set a camp in the high country.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steven Rinella and Hank Shaw hunt in the hills of Central California.

programme.title: Steve's Outdoor Adventures
programme.desc: Steve's Outdoor Adventures is an adventure big game hunting television show featuring western big game hunting with North America's top outfitters and guides.

programme.title: Big Deer TV

programme.title: Legends of the Fall
programme.desc: Legends of the Fall is produced with truly die hard deer hunters in mind. Legends of the Fall chronicles the high-energy hunts and behind-the-scenes action of a dedicated crew of passionate hunters. While the show spotlights a dynamic variety of adrenaline-pumping whitetail bow hunts across North America, it also offers a mix of other big game adventures. Each episode details the lives of all clan members in their tireless, year-round pursuit of all-things whitetail.

programme.title: Rooster Tales

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: HUNTER® is an exciting new series being produced by Hunter Brand Media and hosted by Dave Poteat, that explores the different ways people use their natural hunter element. The first season is rooted in good ole North American big game hunting which is where Host, Dave Poteat's roots run the deepest. But as the series grows in the years to come, we will venture out from the comforts of the Whitetail woods from time to time to see how others act on their Hunter Element.

programme.title: Greg McHale's Wild Yukon
programme.desc: Greg McHale brings a passionate spirit of adventure to his big game hunts in Canada's wild Yukon, creating inspiring and intense journeys that push him physically and mentally. Follow him as he brings his family into the wilderness, creates shared memories and passes on the traditions we all love.

programme.title: Beyond the Bar With Josh and Shasta
programme.desc: Kids are getting older and schedules are getting crazy, but Jossie takes a break to chase some longbeards.

programme.title: Chasing the 29
programme.desc: Join youth hunter Chase Anthony on an exhilarating journey in Chasing the 29. Follow Chase as he pursues the prestigious North American 29, a monumental challenge to hunt 29 big game species across the continent. Also featured on this show are adventures from his Dangerous 7, a daring quest to hunt seven of Africa's most formidable animals. Packed with heart-pounding moments and stunning landscapes, this series showcases Chase's determination, passion, and respect for the wild.

programme.title: The Most Wanted List
programme.desc: Three spitfire cowgirls are headed on a cross country road trip of epic proportions to make their dream adventures come true.

programme.title: Roger Raglin Outdoors
programme.desc: Roger knocks down a huge trophy whitetail buck in Northern Missouri.

programme.title: Bowhunter TV
programme.desc: Curt takes a big Buckeye State buck and goes into serious recovery mode.

programme.title: Winchester & Drury's Natural Born
programme.desc: Follow along with Drury Cast Member Bric Steward as he takes his girls on a couple memorable hunts in the Prairie State.

programme.title: Final Draw
programme.desc: At Final Draw, everything we do is rooted in three unshakable things: God. Family. And the grind. We don't sugarcoat it. We're here to show the raw side of the outdoors-the dirt-under-your-nails kind of living. Hunting, fishing, camping, road-tripping, and passing stories around the fire with folks who matter. This life ain't a luxury -it's a God-given right, and we'll never take it for granted. This isn't just a show. It's who we are.

programme.title: Hornady's Dark & Dangerous
programme.desc: Hornady's Dark & Dangerous is a bold series that documents the highs, lows, harsh realities and tangible risks always present on a fair chase, dangerous game safari into wild Africa. This features Africa's most recognized Professional Hunters who allow the Safari Classics camera crew unprecedented access into the world of real time safari adventure. A unique editing style, featuring multiple hunts, locations, and hunters in action.

programme.title: Adrenaline
programme.desc: Experience the heart-pounding action of fair-chase whitetail hunting with host Kyle Wieter and the entire Adrenaline crew as they pursue giant Midwestern bucks. This dedicated team embraces the challenges of the hunt, navigating intense highs, unexpected lows, and the unpredictable nature of these ultimate survival machines.

programme.title: Trijicon's World of Sports Afield
programme.desc: Hosted by international big game hunter Dave Fulson, Trijicon's World Of Sports Afield takes the viewer around the globe in search of big game adventure. From the rugged Yukon, to the windswept mountains of North America and Asia, to the great game fields of Africa, this series delivers world class hunting in each episode!

programme.title: Jim Shockey's: The Professionals
programme.desc: In pursuit of black duiker and water chevrotain in Liberia.

programme.title: RNT-V

programme.title: Heartland Waterfowl
programme.desc: In the bitter cold of Torrington, Wyoming, the HW crew teams up with High Plains Wingshooters for late-flying geese and all-day pit blind grinds. programme.title: Huntworx
programme.desc: HuntWorxis a new show based around the ideology of the three major principles that aid in consistently harvesting mature animals. It's a battle of patience, but the rewards come heavy-culminating in fresh pushes of new birds and a snow-covered sendoff on the final day.

programme.title: RNT-V
programme.desc: RNT-V is based around the RNT Call Shop in Stuttgart, Arkansas--from chasing ducks and geese over fine retrievers in different parts of the country to uncovering the history of an old time call maker. Hosted by World Champions who are all about the hunt!

programme.title: MOJO TV

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Dave turkey hunts with friends and his daughter in Kansas and Oklahoma City.

programme.title: The Most Wanted List
programme.desc: Kristy and Lee navigate their usual chaos at home before heading to New Mexico's Bear's Den Outfitters to chase speed goats alongside Katie Austin and Kristen Kelly.

programme.title: The Most Wanted List
programme.desc: On the clock with only a day and a half to hunt, Kristen Kelly goes after her first pronghorn; Kristy and Katie Austin wait their turn, hoping the bucks and their luck-don't run off first.

programme.title: Winchester Deadly Passion
programme.desc: We all have those bucket list hunts, but here we cover Melissa's top four adventures.

programme.title: Winchester Deadly Passion
programme.desc: Colorado mule deer via spot and stalk with bow, hard to beat!

programme.title: Venatura excursions
programme.desc: Venatura Excursions takes viewers beyond the storefront of Mumme's Feed & Grain in Hondo, Texas. Each week, employees, distinguished customers, and honored guests of Mumme's embark on unforgettable hunting and fishing trips. From fast flying dove in South Texas, to chasing mule deer and whitetail in West Texas, to deep-sea fishing aboard the 64' Quantified out of South Padre Island, and all the way south to Sonora, Mexico, the series captures the thrill of the spirit of employee camaraderie.

programme.title: Inside Outdoors TV
programme.desc: IOTV is a show for real outdoorsmen with a no B.S. approach full of laughs, tears, ups and downs that come with hunting and the outdoor lifestyle.

programme.title: Trijicon's World of Sports Afield
programme.desc: Hosted by international big game hunter Dave Fulson, Trijicon's World Of Sports Afield takes the viewer around the globe in search of big game adventure. From the rugged Yukon, to the windswept mountains of North America and Asia, to the great game fields of Africa, this series delivers world class hunting in each episode!

programme.title: Hornady's Dark & Dangerous
programme.desc: Hornady's Dark & Dangerous is a bold series that documents the highs, lows, harsh realities and tangible risks always present on a fair chase, dangerous game safari into wild Africa. This features Africa's most recognized Professional Hunters who allow the Safari Classics camera crew unprecedented access into the world of real time safari adventure. A unique editing style, featuring multiple hunts, locations, and hunters in action.

programme.title: Dead Meat

programme.title: Chasing the 29

programme.title: Final Draw
programme.desc: At Final Draw, everything we do is rooted in three unshakable things: God. Family. And the grind. We don't sugarcoat it. We're here to show the raw side of the outdoors-the dirt-under-your-nails kind of living. Hunting, fishing, camping, road-tripping, and passing stories around the fire with folks who matter. This life ain't a luxury -it's a God-given right, and we'll never take it for granted. This isn't just a show. It's who we are.

The hour of programming will also highlight the most relevant stories from India which is currently one of the hottest investment destinations, but also has compelling stories that play into the Bloomberg's priority issues such as Climate change, Diversity and Technological innovation.

programme.desc: Mac Traven (Tom Selleck) is a Civil War veteran who fought for the North, while his brother, Dal (Sam Elliott), was allied with the South. programme.title: The Sundowners

Outlaw Kid Wichita (Robert Preston), another Cloud brother, comes to town to offer his services. After catching some local ranchers messing around with Tom's cattle, he steals the men's saddles. From there, things deteriorate into kidnapping, gang wars and murder, and the line between hero and villain becomes blurred.

programme.desc: After giving up his gunfighting ways, Billy Ringo (George Montgomery) has settled down with his new wife, Arlene (Helen Westcott), on a ranch he's just purchased with his brother, Matt (John Dehner), and nephew Chip (Tab Hunter). But when Matt tricks him into participating in a bank robbery -- and frames him as the ringleader -- Billy is forced to go on the run from lawman Wyatt Earp (James Millican), and once again take up his guns against his former rival, Ike Clinton (William Bishop).

programme.title: The Gun and the Pulpit
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping a lynch mob, atheist gunslinger Ernie Parsons (Marjoe Gortner) steals the identity of a murdered preacher and takes his job in a western town. Ernie falls for the beautiful Sally Underwood (Pamela Sue Martin) and becomes attached to the town he's come to think of as his sanctuary. So when his new home is threatened by a tyrannical land baron, Ernie must use both his extensive skills as a gunfighter and his minimal skills as a preacher to defend the townspeople.

programme.title: Jeremiah Johnson
programme.desc: A Mexican-American War veteran, Jeremiah Johnson (Robert Redford), heads to the mountains to live in isolation. Woefully unequipped for the task at hand, Johnson is fortunate to come across a seasoned mountain man (Will Geer) willing to teach him the necessary survival tactics. As life continues in the mountains, Johnson finds himself a native bride (Delle Bolton) and an adopted son (Josh Albee). However, their peaceful existence is threatened when Johnson incurs the ire of the Crow Indians.

programme.title: River of No Return
programme.desc: After serving a prison sentence, farmer Matt Calder (Robert Mitchum) returns to his 19th-century Pacific Northwest gold rush town and retrieves his adolescent son, Mark (Tommy Rettig). Meanwhile, goodhearted barroom singer Kay (Marilyn Monroe) is heading downriver with her boyfriend, Harry (Rory Calhoun), to explore a potential gold claim. When their raft sinks, Harry robs Matt of his gun and horse to continue without Kay on land. Sailing downriver toward the claim, the trio plan their revenge.

programme.desc: Ben Cartwright is the patriarch of an all-male Nevada ranching family. Set during and after the Civil War, "Bonanza" is the story of life on the family's thousand-acre spread, known as the Ponderosa, near Virginia City. Ben has his three sons, each with a different (and deceased) mother. Serious eldest son Adam hopes to follow in his father's footsteps; middle son Hoss is a gentle giant -- physically strong, but sometimes naive; and youngest son Little Joe is the most impetuous and romantic of the offspring.

programme.desc: Children are the future -- and so are their inventions, which is why "Think Big" could be an important show. It features young inventors competing to see who can come up with the most-innovative invention. Each episode features two teams in the Think Tank -- a studio filled with art supplies and construction materials -- who brainstorm and choose materials before sketching, designing and building a prototype to be presented to a judge, who determines a winner. The champions earn bragging rights and the coveted Genius Cup.

programme.title: America's Heartland
programme.desc: Much of the food Americans eat is produced by farmers and ranchers in the country's heartland, but many people don't know how it's produced. "America's Heartland" provides information about the people and processes responsible for the availability of food and fuel across the country and around the world. The show's reporters and producers tell stories in topics that include farm families, consumer issues, animal welfare and crop sustainability. Some episodes also take the show abroad to countries such as Egypt and Taiwan to show the impact American agriculture has on the global economy.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E7 Calamity Jane Saves the Day Throughout Deadwood, Calamity Jane is known as a hot-tempered drunk. But when a deadly smallpox outbreak spreads through town, Calamity Jane works tirelessly to save the lives of the infected citizens who once treated her with such contempt.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E13 The Four Dead in Five Seconds Gunfight After two Mexican vaqueros cross the border in search of their stolen cattle, they are gunned down by the rustlers. When El Paso's newly appointed marshal arrests local ranch hands for the murders, he sparks one of the West's most infamous gunfights.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E7 Jim Clyman: Frontier Survivor When he is separated from his trapping party, frontiersman Jim Clyman is 600 miles from the nearest fort. To survive the grueling trek, he must put his fate in the hands of Native Americans, without knowing if they will help him or kill him on sight.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S3 E9 Heart of a Champion With only four remaining cowboys, host Trace Adkins and the judges test the competitors abilities to show off their own horses and complete a task on a horse they've never seen before. In the end, Trace sends a cowboy packing.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E1 A House Divided After the destruction of a Pony Express station in Rock Creek, Teaspoon, The Kid, and Jimmy receive an assignment to rebuild it. They must relocate and learn the new territory near town as well as the neighbors in the area.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E6 Indian Gold Sioux brave White Crow needs medical help for his sick wife, Little Fawn. Cheyenne and Doc Farnsworth leave to go see her. When White Crow returns with gold as payment to heal her, the locals want to invade Sioux territory, possibly starting a war.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E7 Dark Decision Cheyenne helps a blind woman named Constance Mason after a cattle stampede tramples her wagon. Once in town, she gets a job as a singer in a casino. She soon falls for a crooked gambler who is trying to pin a murder charge on Cheyenne.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E7 Knight Errant Two old friends of Lucas', Don Chumera De Lardo and Colonel Black, come to the McCain Ranch. They are there to finish a deed of honor, even insisting on a jousting match. Lucas learns that the feud started over a chess game.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E8 Honest Abe A neighbor of Lucas' believes he is Abe Lincoln after being mentally injured in the Civil War. Townspeople go along with his impersonation since he is a kind man. However, when a saloon patron makes fun of him, trouble ensues.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E9 The Long Goodbye Stubborn Grandpa Fogerty lives in a rundown house with his grandson, Woody. Lucas tries to get the old man to send the boy to school. The ladies of North Fork want Woody removed from the home and ask Lucas to help them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E10 The Shattered Idol Famous writer Mark Twain visits North Fork and Mark, who idolizes him, is hurt by his rudeness. Lucas intervenes and discovers the source of Twain's bitterness comes from personal tragedy. Later, both Marks become friends.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E3 This Is My First Rodeo! As the cowboys prepare their pastures for an incoming shipment of Florida cattle, they discover their current herd has escaped through a downed fence. It's a rush to get the pasture back in shape in order to house the new cattle for the winter and ensure a healthy calving season. Bubba assembles a portable horse stall to protect his horse in a distant field. Misty's gallbladder surgery has Cody worried. After Matthew graduates from pony to big horse, he decides he wants to win his own rodeo belt buckle, so Booger trains him to compete in a mutton busting competition.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E4 A Dying Breed The cowboys head back to South Florida to move cattle across a 10-mile route for their new business partner. An old friend of Booger's grandfather leads the cattle drive and helps guide the cowboys through the swampy terrain. Reminiscing about the old days inspires Booger to organize a cattle drive of his own. The cowboys are spending more and more time on the road, and Kaley is struggling to keep things in order back at home. Cody and Misty move forward with their homebuilding plans, and they decide to host a groundbreaking party.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E9 The Most Amazing Man Wade Randall comes to North Fork and mesmerizes children with big stories of his past gun battles with outlaws. Lucas suspects he is all talk and exposes the truth after Randall refuses to accept a shootout challenge.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E10 Squeeze Play A land speculator named Willard Prescott contacts Lucas about buying his land as the railroad is fast approaching the area. He bribes Lucas and when he refuses, Prescott makes it clear he will stop at nothing to get his land, one way or the other.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E1 They Killed Me Frontiersman Jim Bridger spins an incredible tale to a group of settlers, claiming he was once killed by Blackfeet warriors yet somehow lived to tell the tale. They think he's joking, but Bridger soon proves that he really did rise from the dead.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E4 Brothers in Arms When they are ambushed by a Blackfeet war party, Jim Bridger and a lone Shoshone brave must work together to find a way to defeat their common enemy. If they can't overcome their suspicions and learn to trust each other, they may not survive the day.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E7 Calamity Jane Saves the Day Throughout Deadwood, Calamity Jane is known as a hot-tempered drunk. But when a deadly smallpox outbreak spreads through town, Calamity Jane works tirelessly to save the lives of the infected citizens who once treated her with such contempt.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E10 The Shattered Idol Famous writer Mark Twain visits North Fork and Mark, who idolizes him, is hurt by his rudeness. Lucas intervenes and discovers the source of Twain's bitterness comes from personal tragedy. Later, both Marks become friends.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E5 Another Man's Treasure When a neighbor asks the guys for help with his unruly herd, the cowboys ride to his rescue. But this time the cattle refuse to cooperate, and the cowboys reluctantly decide to return another day after the herd settles down. Bubba invests in a group of horses in order to train them for ranch work and sell them at a profit. Cody sets out to discover whether anything of value is buried beneath some of his land. Booger gets permission from the city to hold an old-fashioned community cattle drive, and he works with his grandma to plan the festivities.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E6 Keep Them Doggies Rollin' The cowboys make a second attempt at rounding up their neighbor's unruly herd, and this time they come out on top as they finally manage to get the cattle penned up. Booger overcomes a number of obstacles in order to pull off an old-fashioned cattle drive right through the center of town. With a number of townsfolk along for the ride, it's slow going, but if he can impress the mayor, it just might become an annual event. Grandma gives the wives a lesson in cowgirl cooking, as they prepare swamp cabbage for the hungry cowboys on the cattle drive.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E11 Gun Shy After one of Mark's friends dies due to a shooting accident, he is totally against his father having a rifle. Lucas explains in vain the need for a rifle on the frontier, leading to Mark running away. Meanwhile, Lou has problems with a wanted outlaw.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E12 The Anvil Chorus North Fork's blacksmith, Nils Swenson, volunteers to fill in for Marshal Micah Torrance while he is out of town. To keep the peace, Nils starts a policy that everyone turns in their gun upon entry to the town. His plan backfires when outlaws arrive.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Spirit of Truth After his fur trapping expedition is surprised by a Crow war party, legendary mountain man Jim Bridger suddenly finds himself in a desperate struggle to rescue his fellow trappers when one of them goes missing, and another is on the brink of madness.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Fossil Feud When bloodthirsty Canadian trappers try to kill him, mountain man Jim Bridger takes cover in an unexplored valley. There, he runs headlong into a family of escaped slaves who show him the huge footprints and fossilized bones of long-dead monsters.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E5 The Gold Rush Detectives When gold goes missing from a safe in a remote mining town, Wells Fargo sends detectives Henry Johnson and Isaiah Lees to hunt down the culprits. Though the two men couldn't be more different, they must learn to work together to crack the case.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E4 Burton Mossman Crosses the Line After failing to capture the ruthless murderer Augustine Chacon on U.S. soil, Arizona Ranger Burton Mossman relinquishes his badge to cross the border. In Mexico, he goes undercover as a horse thief to join Chacon's gang and spring his trap.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E3 Andrew Henry: Man of His Word Though Andrew Henry has little experience when he partners in a trapping expedition, he pledges his word to complete the risky venture. As Blackfeet warriors close in, he must weigh his personal integrity against the lives of the men he leads.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S3 E10 The Final Drive The finale! The three top cowboys sort the prize cattle from wide-open pastures over treacherous terrain. Trace Adkins names the winner.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E2 Jesse A young man named Jesse is out for revenge on a gang of outlaws responsible for his guardian's death. The riders befriend and protect Jesse by stepping in and taking him to Rock Creek before it is too late.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E8 Pocketful of Stars In order to bypass sacred Shoshone burial grounds, Cheyenne scouts land for the railroad. Cheyenne's deal doesn't satisfy the railroad foreman and others. They try to eliminate him by any means possible, including using a Chinese girl to poison him.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E9 The Vanishing Breed Appointed to fill an empty seat in the senate, Cheyenne starts a campaign to preserve the American bison after a tragic buffalo stampede. He soon discovers that politics is really not his strong suit and should return as a gunfighter.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E11 Long Gun from Tucson A killer, John Holliver, and his followers come to North Fork looking for revenge. All of the residents are terrified since they ran him out of town five years earlier. Lucas, now acting marshal, realizes that he must face Holliver and his men alone.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E12 The High Country Two mountain men, Ambrose and Gorwin, come to the McCain Ranch. Ambrose is captivated by Lucas' rifle but Lucas won't trade it. After Gorwin is killed trying to steal it, the family holds Lucas accountable.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E13 A Friend in Need A man named Carl Avery kidnaps Mark and demands a $5,000 ransom for his safe return. Lucas mortgages his ranch to a longtime friend for the money. When Lucas delivers the ransom, he discovers his friend is part of the disturbing kidnapping plot.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E14 Skull Lucas and Mark are separated on a hunting trip. During his search, Lucas enters Skull Ranch, a headquarters for outlaws. The gang forces him to help break out two members from jail. Lucas has no choice after he learns they've captured Mark as well.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E5 Another Man's Treasure When a neighbor asks the guys for help with his unruly herd, the cowboys ride to his rescue. But this time the cattle refuse to cooperate, and the cowboys reluctantly decide to return another day after the herd settles down. Bubba invests in a group of horses in order to train them for ranch work and sell them at a profit. Cody sets out to discover whether anything of value is buried beneath some of his land. Booger gets permission from the city to hold an old-fashioned community cattle drive, and he works with his grandma to plan the festivities.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E6 Keep Them Doggies Rollin' The cowboys make a second attempt at rounding up their neighbor's unruly herd, and this time they come out on top as they finally manage to get the cattle penned up. Booger overcomes a number of obstacles in order to pull off an old-fashioned cattle drive right through the center of town. With a number of townsfolk along for the ride, it's slow going, but if he can impress the mayor, it just might become an annual event. Grandma gives the wives a lesson in cowgirl cooking, as they prepare swamp cabbage for the hungry cowboys on the cattle drive.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E11 Gun Shy After one of Mark's friends dies due to a shooting accident, he is totally against his father having a rifle. Lucas explains in vain the need for a rifle on the frontier, leading to Mark running away. Meanwhile, Lou has problems with a wanted outlaw.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E13 A Friend in Need A man named Carl Avery kidnaps Mark and demands a $5,000 ransom for his safe return. Lucas mortgages his ranch to a longtime friend for the money. When Lucas delivers the ransom, he discovers his friend is part of the disturbing kidnapping plot.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E14 Skull Lucas and Mark are separated on a hunting trip. During his search, Lucas enters Skull Ranch, a headquarters for outlaws. The gang forces him to help break out two members from jail. Lucas has no choice after he learns they've captured Mark as well.

programme.title: The Warrant: Breaker's Law
programme.desc: U.S. Marshal John Breaker and his deputy ride to a town held hostage by a ruthless gang as they transport a prisoner through the West. With the fate of a community at stake, they must decide if they will abandon the town or make a stand for justice.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E13 Conflict While hunting, Lucas misses an easy shot at a cougar just a few feet away, and seconds from attacking Mark. After discovering that his gun is not the problem, Lucas begins to doubt his abilities with a rifle, leading him to do some soul-searching.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E14 Incident at Line Shack Six Railroad boss John Gangling runs an operation at Line Shack Six. Gangling pays his men in gold and when he finds that Charlie Been saves his wages in a money belt, he kills him for it. An innocent Indian who happens to stop by is accused of murder.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Nels Stack Story Nels Stack, a war veteran, joins the wagon train. He is now a pacifist who defends against any prejudice. Stack's mild manner leads others to label him a coward. But the tides turn when his kindness gets the train out of dangerous Indian territory.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E6 Sister Blandina and the Killer When a bloodthirsty mob storms a jailhouse holding a man accused of attempted murder, they are confronted by a 22-year-old missionary from the Sisters of Charity. Only Sister Blandina can stop the vigilantes from taking the law into their own hands.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E1 Bat Masterson to the Rescue Now without a badge, former lawman Bat Masterson finds himself powerless to help an old friend whose brother has been falsely imprisoned. An overreaching sheriff is intent on seeing the brother hang, so Bat hatches a plan to bust him out of jail.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E1 Kit Carson: Fearless Fighter While coming of age on America's frontier, Kit Carson sets a new standard for steely nerves and fearlessness. But his legend is born when a Native woman is insulted by a notorious bully of the mountains, and Kit challenges the man to a duel to death.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S4 E1 All-Star Showdown In this all-star edition, 14 top cowboys from past seasons return for another shot at winning a $50,000 herd of cattle. As the cowboys compete in the Arizona desert, host Trace Adkins and his expert judges decide who will be the first to go home.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E3 The Blood of Others Lou, Jimmy, and The Kid are on a mission of taking a long-sought-after outlaw to hang. On the way, The Kid is injured, but the others continue without him. They are confronted by a vindictive ex-sheriff who's bent on killing the man before he hangs.

programme.title: Sitting Bull
programme.desc: A U.S. Cavalry officer begins to understand the plight of the Sioux and arranges a meeting between Chief Sitting Bull and President Grant.

programme.title: War of the Wildcats
programme.desc: During the early days of the Oklahoma oil boom, a greedy, self-assured oilman and a quiet, yet determined cowboy fight for the rights to oil on Indian land. All the while a pretty schoolteacher steals both men's hearts.

programme.title: The Warrant: Breaker's Law
programme.desc: U.S. Marshal John Breaker and his deputy ride to a town held hostage by a ruthless gang as they transport a prisoner through the West. With the fate of a community at stake, they must decide if they will abandon the town or make a stand for justice.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S4 E1 All-Star Showdown In this all-star edition, 14 top cowboys from past seasons return for another shot at winning a $50,000 herd of cattle. As the cowboys compete in the Arizona desert, host Trace Adkins and his expert judges decide who will be the first to go home.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E3 The Blood of Others Lou, Jimmy, and The Kid are on a mission of taking a long-sought-after outlaw to hang. On the way, The Kid is injured, but the others continue without him. They are confronted by a vindictive ex-sheriff who's bent on killing the man before he hangs.

programme.title: Sitting Bull
programme.desc: A U.S. Cavalry officer begins to understand the plight of the Sioux and arranges a meeting between Chief Sitting Bull and President Grant.

programme.title: War of the Wildcats
programme.desc: During the early days of the Oklahoma oil boom, a greedy, self-assured oilman and a quiet, yet determined cowboy fight for the rights to oil on Indian land. All the while a pretty schoolteacher steals both men's hearts.

programme.title: Heritage Falls
programme.desc: Basketball coach Charlie Fitzpatrick has had a rocky relationship with his son, Evan, but now he has a great idea on how to heal the past. He takes his son, and grandson, Markie, to a rustic cabin where he hopes they will all bond by hiking and running an obstacle course. It's Evan's worst nightmare. Over three hilarious, adventurous, soul-searching days the men discover what it means to be a father, a son, a grandfather.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E25 Which Way'd They Go? The Jackman clan must sell their farm to pay back taxes. The Jackmans were not much at farming so they move to a nearby town and take jobs as peace officers. When bank robbers confront them, Lucas must step in and help them deal with the outlaws.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E26 Old Tony Old Tony, an irritable old recluse, has a reputation in North Fork as being a mean hermit. When Mark and his girlfriend, Lorrie, look for arrowheads on his land, they become trapped in quicksand. Tony shows his good-hearted nature and rescues them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E1 The Sharpshooter Lucas McCain and his son, Mark, arrive in North Fork to purchase a ranch. When Lucas enters a turkey shoot to win money for a down payment, he soon finds himself at odds with town villain Jim Lewis.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E2 Home Ranch After Lucas buys his ranch, hired hands of a wealthy cattleman demand he leave. When Lucas refuses, the men beat him, drag him, and then they burn his ranch house to the ground. Lucas tracks these men down and confronts their boss, Oat Jackford.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E7 Daniel Boone: Hero of Kentucky After frontiersman Daniel Boone forges paths across the Appalachian Mountains and into the newly discovered lands of Kentucky, he founds the settlement of Boonesborough, which quickly becomes one of the most important outposts on colonial America's frontier. But this westward expansion comes at a price. Despite agreements made with the powerful Cherokee nation, conflict between the settlers and natives soon rages like wildfire. For Boone, the strife becomes intensely personal when his daughter and two other young women are abducted by Hanging Maw, a fearsome Cherokee chief. In a desperate chase, Boone pursues Hanging Maw's warriors and their captives through untamed wilderness, with his daughter's life hanging in the balance.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Great Train Robbery Bat Masterson, former gunfighter and sheriff, is now working as a newspaperman. He heads west again to uncover the story behind one of the country's greatest train robberies. Although Butch and Sundance are long gone, Masterson tracks down Sundance's former girlfriend, Etta Place, to draw out more details. To pull off the audacious robbery, they used official Union Pacific lanterns to signal the train and fool the engineer into believing a bridge was out. As Etta reluctantly relives the events of the robbery and its aftermath, it's obvious that she is still smitten by Sundance after all of these years.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E4 The Legend of the Blue-Eyed Apache When eleven-year-old Herman Lehmann is torn away from his frontier home by an Apache raiding party, he must adapt in order to survive. He soon forgets the life he unwillingly left behind and is adopted by an Apache family. For close to a decade, he lives as a Native American, learning their language and customs. Eventually, he even joins the same type of raiding party that separated him from his family. Though the years pass by, Herman's mother never gives up hope that she will be reunited with her son. One day, she hears a rumor of a blue-eyed Apache now living on a reservation. Could this be her long-lost son? Some years later, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews Herman's mother to uncover the real story of the blue-eyed Apache.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E3 Cross Purpose Cheyenne finds himself involved in a dispute regarding dead war hero, Colonel Charles DeVier. Many believe the Comanches killed him, but the discovery of the hero's body and the disappearance of Captain Robert Holman leads Cheyenne to the truth.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E31 The Jailbird Bessie Steel Weaver welcomes her husband, Farley, home after his release from prison. Lucas hires him as a hand believing he has changed his ways. However, when a murder occurs during a local robbery, suspicions are aroused.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E32 Meeting at Midnight Lucas' old Army buddy, Tom Benton, comes to North Fork raising a ruckus. Micah arrests him and Lucas bails him out. Benton, an undercover federal agent, wants to stay in jail to hopefully infiltrate a gang of bank robbers.

programme.title: McLintock!
programme.desc: A cattle baron awaits the return of his daughter from school and is surprised that his wife has returned to take their daughter away. He tries to keep the peace and do what is best for everyone.

programme.title: Yuma
programme.desc: When a tough, veteran United States marshal is sent to clean up a down-and-dirty Western town, he faces a scheme to remove his authority and ruin his reputation.

programme.title: McLintock!
programme.desc: A cattle baron awaits the return of his daughter from school and is surprised that his wife has returned to take their daughter away. He tries to keep the peace and do what is best for everyone.

programme.title: Yuma
programme.desc: When a tough, veteran United States marshal is sent to clean up a down-and-dirty Western town, he faces a scheme to remove his authority and ruin his reputation.

programme.title: The Proud Rebel
programme.desc: A Confederate veteran battles prejudice and greed as he helps a woman save her ranch from a land grab, while searching for a cure for his mute son.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E12 Song of Isiah Isiah Burke and his wife Rosemary are abolitionists who are trying to lead a group to freedom. Jimmy, who is visiting his sister, becomes involved with them but soon finds out that their tactics are too violent.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E5 The Brother-In-Law Mark's uncle, Johnny Gibb, a famous rodeo rider, comes to visit. Mark idolizes his uncle, but Lucas soon discovers that Johnny is on the run from the law after robbing an express office, and is afraid that Johnny is a bad influence on young Mark.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E6 Eight Hours to Die Corrupt Judge Burton seeks justice against those who are responsible for the hanging of his son, including Lucas McCain, who caught him. When Burton discovers that Lucas has a son, he captures Lucas to make him watch Mark suffer the same punishment.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E9 Elfego Baca & the Frisco Shootout Just days on the job and brandishing a homemade badge, nineteen-year-old Deputy Elfego Baca's courage is immediately put to the test. After arresting a drunken cowboy for shooting up a saloon, Baca faces down the cowboy's friends, who are hired guns for a wealthy rancher. He wins the first skirmish, but the cowboys return with reinforcements and the stage is set for the biggest and longest gunfight in Old West history. Baca seeks shelter in a small adobe house and makes his stand against a small army of men who shoot up the house with thousands of rounds of ammunition over the course of 33 hours. Years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson gets the real story of what comes to be known as the Frisco Shootout from the former sheriff who deputized Baca just prior to the legendary gun battle.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E14 Annie Oakley: Rise of a Shooting Star After her father's death, nine-year-old Annie Oakley first picks up a rifle and begins shooting small game in order to feed her siblings and support her widowed mother. By her teenage years, Annie is so good at hunting that she begins supplying meat to a local grocery store, earning enough money to pay off her mother's mortgage. When famed sharpshooter Frank Butler comes to town for an exhibition, Annie accepts his challenge to participate in a shooting match. Not only does she win the match, but she wins Butler's heart as well. They are soon married, but they struggle to make it as a team on stage. A better shooter, Annie must become the main attraction for them to succeed. Years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson, tracks down Annie's husband to learn more about the rise of this shooting star.

programme.title: Freedom on the Range
programme.desc: S1 E1 From brave lawmen to rugged cowboys, discover the untold stories of African Americans' cultural significance in the Old West.

programme.title: Only the Valiant
programme.desc: A cavalry officer is blamed by his men and his lady for the death of a popular officer. Now, he must find a way to stop an Indian attack on their fort. It might prove to be the only way to regain the trust of his men and the affection of his woman.

programme.title: The Gambler
programme.desc: When a card shark receives a letter from a distant and troubled son, he travels to rescue the boy and his mother. During a train ride, the gambler meets a friendly, prideful young card player and shares his wisdom.

programme.title: Kansas Pacific
programme.desc: With talks of a Civil War brewing, Southern saboteurs know they must keep Northern forces from using the U.S. train system. They devise a daring and dangerous plan to stop and capture a railroad engine, preventing the completion of a railroad line.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E15 A Case of Identity Aaron Wingate lost his wife and son in a river boat fire years ago. The boy was never found. Wingate hires two private detectives who come to North Fork and decide that Mark will fit the bill. Lucas must fight for custody.

programme.title: The Proud Rebel
programme.desc: A Confederate veteran battles prejudice and greed as he helps a woman save her ranch from a land grab, while searching for a cure for his mute son.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E12 Song of Isiah Isiah Burke and his wife Rosemary are abolitionists who are trying to lead a group to freedom. Jimmy, who is visiting his sister, becomes involved with them but soon finds out that their tactics are too violent.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E5 The Brother-In-Law Mark's uncle, Johnny Gibb, a famous rodeo rider, comes to visit. Mark idolizes his uncle, but Lucas soon discovers that Johnny is on the run from the law after robbing an express office, and is afraid that Johnny is a bad influence on young Mark.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E6 Eight Hours to Die Corrupt Judge Burton seeks justice against those who are responsible for the hanging of his son, including Lucas McCain, who caught him. When Burton discovers that Lucas has a son, he captures Lucas to make him watch Mark suffer the same punishment.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E9 Elfego Baca & the Frisco Shootout Just days on the job and brandishing a homemade badge, nineteen-year-old Deputy Elfego Baca's courage is immediately put to the test. After arresting a drunken cowboy for shooting up a saloon, Baca faces down the cowboy's friends, who are hired guns for a wealthy rancher. He wins the first skirmish, but the cowboys return with reinforcements and the stage is set for the biggest and longest gunfight in Old West history. Baca seeks shelter in a small adobe house and makes his stand against a small army of men who shoot up the house with thousands of rounds of ammunition over the course of 33 hours. Years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson gets the real story of what comes to be known as the Frisco Shootout from the former sheriff who deputized Baca just prior to the legendary gun battle.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E14 Annie Oakley: Rise of a Shooting Star After her father's death, nine-year-old Annie Oakley first picks up a rifle and begins shooting small game in order to feed her siblings and support her widowed mother. By her teenage years, Annie is so good at hunting that she begins supplying meat to a local grocery store, earning enough money to pay off her mother's mortgage. When famed sharpshooter Frank Butler comes to town for an exhibition, Annie accepts his challenge to participate in a shooting match. Not only does she win the match, but she wins Butler's heart as well. They are soon married, but they struggle to make it as a team on stage. A better shooter, Annie must become the main attraction for them to succeed. Years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson, tracks down Annie's husband to learn more about the rise of this shooting star.

programme.title: Freedom on the Range
programme.desc: S1 E1 From brave lawmen to rugged cowboys, discover the untold stories of African Americans' cultural significance in the Old West.

programme.title: Only the Valiant
programme.desc: A cavalry officer is blamed by his men and his lady for the death of a popular officer. Now, he must find a way to stop an Indian attack on their fort. It might prove to be the only way to regain the trust of his men and the affection of his woman.

programme.title: The Gambler
programme.desc: When a card shark receives a letter from a distant and troubled son, he travels to rescue the boy and his mother. During a train ride, the gambler meets a friendly, prideful young card player and shares his wisdom.

programme.desc: A distance of 12.4 miles, 156 corners and a climb of 4,720 feet make up the most fabled mountain in motorsports; each year competitors make the trek to see if they can conquer the climb up Pikes Peak.

programme.title: Racers Roundtable With Danny Sullivan & Tony Stewart
programme.desc: What's it like to drive for Roger Penske? Go behind the curtain with Rusty Wallace, Sam Hornish Jr., & Ryan Newman.

programme.title: 2025 Pikes Peak International Hill Climb
programme.desc: A distance of 12.4 miles, 156 corners and a climb of 4,720 feet make up the most fabled mountain in motorsports; each year competitors make the trek to see if they can conquer the climb up Pikes Peak.

programme.desc: A distance of 12.4 miles, 156 corners and a climb of 4,720 feet make up the most fabled mountain in motorsports; each year competitors make the trek to see if they can conquer the climb up Pikes Peak.

programme.title: 2025 British GT Championship
programme.desc: The British GT Championship is one of the longest-running GT programs in the world. It has two divisions - GT3 and GT4 and is one of 5 GT Championships around the world (Europe, America, Asia and Australia being the others ) operated by the SRO Organization.

programme.title: Racers Unchained
programme.desc: Paul Tracy engages in an in-depth conversation with Ray Evernham, a influential figure in NASCAR's history; from his early days as a modified racer to his innovative tenure as a crew chief and team owner, his influence on the sport is profound.

programme.title: Launch Control
programme.desc: Travis Pastrana has a change of heart after taking time off, returning to the Oregon Trail Rally. Back in Vermont, the team starts building Project Midnight WRX in preparation for Scott Speed's debut at Goodwood Festival of Speed.

programme.title: Launch Control
programme.desc: Scott Speed debuts Subaru's Project Midnight WRX at the 2024 Goodwood Festival of Speed, while Travis Pastrana returns with the Family Huckster to put on a show.

programme.title: Racers Unchained
programme.desc: Paul Tracy sits down with Scott Dixon, the six-time IndyCar Series champion and 2008 Indianapolis 500 winner. Dixon shares insights from his illustrious career spanning over two decades with Chip Ganassi Racing.

programme.title: Prodigy Racing League
programme.desc: Drafted by Williams, G2, Guild, BS+, SuckerPunch, and Thibaut Courtois, 30 of the world's best gamers, from 100K+ who entered season 1, battle in the Prodigy Racing League. Only 20 advance to the next PRL series. This is the future of motorsports.

programme.title: Vicari Auction Show
programme.desc: Specializing in muscle, classic and late model exotics, Vicari Auctions have grown to offer over 600 vehicles up for bid with no reserve while generating over $8 million in sales at each event.

programme.title: LOKAR Car Show
programme.desc: A special race event and car show at Virginia International Raceway raises awareness and support for families affected by ALS.

programme.title: Dealer Life
programme.desc: Dan and Ellen get an exclusive invitation to the Richard Petty Museum to meet the King himself; they take a tour of Petty's garage and childhood home; at the dealership, Rama sells a bike and invites a new customer out on a ride.
