programme.title: Rooster Tales
programme.desc: Rooster Tales takes viewers on exciting upland bird hunting adventures across North America in search of wild birds in wild places. Host, Travis Frank, shares stories from the field about passionate bird hunters, bird dogs, habitat conservation, and DIY bird hunts on public land.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: HUNTER® is an exciting new series being produced by Hunter Brand Media and hosted by Dave Poteat, that explores the different ways people use their natural hunter element. The first season is rooted in good ole North American big game hunting which is where Host, Dave Poteat's roots run the deepest. But as the series grows in the years to come, we will venture out from the comforts of the Whitetail woods from time to time to see how others act on their Hunter Element.

programme.title: Greg McHale's Wild Yukon
programme.desc: Greg McHale brings a passionate spirit of adventure to his big game hunts in Canada's wild Yukon, creating inspiring and intense journeys that push him physically and mentally. Follow him as he brings his family into the wilderness, creates shared memories and passes on the traditions we all love.

programme.title: Beyond the Bar With Josh and Shasta
programme.desc: Kids are getting older and schedules are getting crazy, but Jossie takes a break to chase some longbeards.

programme.title: Chasing the 29
programme.desc: Join youth hunter Chase Anthony on an exhilarating journey in Chasing the 29. Follow Chase as he pursues the prestigious North American 29, a monumental challenge to hunt 29 big game species across the continent. Also featured on this show are adventures from his Dangerous 7, a daring quest to hunt seven of Africa's most formidable animals. Packed with heart-pounding moments and stunning landscapes, this series showcases Chase's determination, passion, and respect for the wild.

programme.title: The Most Wanted List

programme.title: Bowhunter TV
programme.desc: Curt takes a big Buckeye State buck and goes into serious recovery mode.

programme.title: Winchester & Drury's Natural Born
programme.desc: Follow along with Drury Cast Member Bric Steward as he takes his girls on a couple memorable hunts in the Prairie State.

programme.title: Final Draw
programme.desc: At Final Draw, everything we do is rooted in three unshakable things: God. Family. And the grind. We don't sugarcoat it. We're here to show the raw side of the outdoors-the dirt-under-your-nails kind of living. Hunting, fishing, camping, road-tripping, and passing stories around the fire with folks who matter. This life ain't a luxury -it's a God-given right, and we'll never take it for granted. This isn't just a show. It's who we are.

programme.title: Hornady's Dark & Dangerous
programme.desc: Hornady's Dark & Dangerous is a bold series that documents the highs, lows, harsh realities and tangible risks always present on a fair chase, dangerous game safari into wild Africa. This features Africa's most recognized Professional Hunters who allow the Safari Classics camera crew unprecedented access into the world of real time safari adventure. A unique editing style, featuring multiple hunts, locations, and hunters in action.

From the rugged Yukon, to the windswept mountains of North America and Asia, to the great game fields of Africa, this series delivers world class hunting in each episode!

programme.title: Heartland Waterfowl
programme.desc: In the bitter cold of Torrington, Wyoming, the HW crew teams up with High Plains Wingshooters for late-flying geese and all-day pit blind grinds. It's a battle of patience, but the rewards come heavy-culminating in fresh pushes of new birds and a snow-covered sendoff on the final day.

programme.title: Small Town Hunting

programme.title: Adventures of Chapo Gringo

With his charismatic personality and quick wit, Robert ensures non-stop entertainment and laughter throughout.

programme.title: Huntworx
programme.desc: HuntWorxis a new show based around the ideology of the three major principles that aid in consistently harvesting mature animals. programme.title: Venatura excursions
programme.desc: Venatura Excursions takes viewers beyond the storefront of Mumme's Feed & Grain in Hondo, Texas. Each week, employees, distinguished customers, and honored guests of Mumme's embark on unforgettable hunting and fishing trips. From fast flying dove in South Texas, to chasing mule deer and whitetail in West Texas, to deep-sea fishing aboard the 64' Quantified out of South Padre Island, and all the way south to Sonora, Mexico, the series captures the thrill of the spirit of employee camaraderie.

programme.desc: Children are the future -- and so are their inventions, which is why "Think Big" could be an important show. "America's Heartland" provides information about the people and processes responsible for the availability of food and fuel across the country and around the world. The show's reporters and producers tell stories in topics that include farm families, consumer issues, animal welfare and crop sustainability. Some episodes also take the show abroad to countries such as Egypt and Taiwan to show the impact American agriculture has on the global economy.

programme.title: Weekend Recharge
programme.desc: Though it has "weekend" in the title, this show discusses the week ahead in addition to offering suggestions for what to do on Saturday and Sunday. Weather Channel meteorologists go beyond the elements outside and into the realm of lifestyle tips. Each host has a recurring segment on "Weekend Recharge," which includes helping parents get a fresh start to each day and explaining how the weather is expected to impact the weekend's scheduled sports action.
